text: Stevie McCrorie (born 1985) is a Scottish singer, musician and firefighter. He is best known for winning the fourth series of The Voice UK in April 2015. McCrorie's first song was called "Lost Stars". It was released on 5 April 2015. He used to be a singer from 2010 until 2012 and again has had a new career since January 2015. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Firefighters Category:Reality show winners Category:Scottish pop singers Category:Falkirk
title: Stevie McCrorie
